Class PythonUtils

extends Object
    Represents a container for Python-related utility methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Pattern LONGSTRING_APOS
      Matches an apostrophe followed by two more apostrophes as a Python long-string delimiter and not following a backslash escape or following an even number¹ of backslash escapes:

    • Field Detail

      • LONGSTRING_APOS

        public static final Pattern LONGSTRING_APOS
        Matches an apostrophe followed by two more apostrophes as a Python long-string delimiter and not following a backslash escape or following an even number¹ of backslash escapes: 
         
 \'(?=\'\') #...
        (Edit above and paste below [in NetBeans] for easy String escaping.)

        ¹See RegexUtils.getNotFollowingEscapePattern() for a caveat about the backslash assertion.
